content.en: Happy World Reef Day! The world's most famous coral reef is the Great Barrier Reef in Australia. It's the world's biggest reef too.
content.tw: 全世界最大的珊瑚礁在澳洲的大堡礁。

content.en: Coral reefs are very important for life underwater. Many kinds of fish live in them. They're like apartment buildings for fish! Some people fish there. They sell or eat the fish.
content.tw: 很多魚類住在珊瑚礁裡面，牠們就像魚的公寓。有一些人會捕魚來自己吃或拿去賣。

content.en: Taiwan's biggest coral reef is by Lamay Island. But more than half of Lamay Island's reef died in 2020. This is because the ocean is getting warmer. It's sometimes too warm for coral reefs.
content.tw: 台灣最大的珊瑚礁在小琉球，但是 2020 年，小琉球的珊瑚死了一半以上。因為海洋溫度升高。

content.en: Coral reefs are made of millions of very small coral animals. Reefs take thousands of years to grow. But we need them now.
content.tw: 珊瑚礁是由數百萬極小的珊瑚蟲組成，要好幾千年才形成。

content.en: Scientists are working to save coral reefs. Last year, they tried a new idea. They planted new coral on reefs. These scientists are underwater gardeners!
content.tw: 科學家正在努力拯救珊瑚礁，他們在珊瑚礁上種新的珊瑚，他們是海底的園藝師！

content.en: The idea worked! The new coral grew. More fish came every day!
content.tw: 這個計畫成功了！新的珊瑚長了出來，更多魚來到珊瑚礁附近！

content.en: Scientists gardening underwater, saving reefs and protecting ocean life! Far out, dude!
content.tw: 科學家在水下園藝，拯救珊瑚礁並保護海洋生物！太棒了，老兄！

vocabulary.preface: 氣候暖化造成很多地方的珊瑚礁大量死亡，科學家忙著搶救。

content.text:
1. underwater 在水下
It's so hot today! 今天好熱喔！
Yeah, I wish I could go diving underwater. 對啊，真希望潛到水裡。

2. ocean 海洋
In the ocean? 潛到海裡？
In the ocean, with colorful fish, turtles and coral reefs around me.
在海裡，四周都是繽紛的魚、烏龜和珊瑚礁。
Where can you find such a place? 哪裡可以找到這種地方？
Xiao-liu-qiu. 小琉球。

3. warmer 更溫暖的
But it's in Pingtung. 不過那在屏東。
It maybe even warmer there. 那裡可能更熱。

4. die 死亡
You're right. 你說得對。
But I'd die if I didn't go swimming somewhere.
但是假如我不去哪裡游泳我就會熱死。

vocabulary.postscript:
今天的單字你可記住了？
underwater 在水下
ocean 海洋
warmer 更溫暖的
die 死亡

quiz.question: 1. What is the world's most famous coral reef?
2. Where is Taiwan's biggest coral reef?
3. What is making coral reefs die?

title: Robots Find Salt Water on Mars

content.en: What does "environment" mean?
Go outside. Look around. Lie on the grass. Look at the sky.
Our environment is the natural things around us. It is the air, plants, animals, the clouds in the sky…
content.tw: 什麼是環境呢？出去走走，到處看看，躺在草皮上，望向天空。我們的環境就是空氣、植物、動物跟天空中的雲。

content.en: The Earth's environment keeps us alive. We have air to breathe. We have water to drink and food to eat.
content.tw: 地球的環境讓我們有空氣可以呼吸，我們有水可以喝，有食物可以吃。

content.en: But our planet has 8 billion people! It needs help.
content.tw: 但地球有八十億人口！它需要幫助。

content.en: We can help. But can another planet help too? Can people live there one day?
Hmmm...which planet? Some planets are too hot or too cold. Some are okay. But do they have water?
content.tw: 我們幫得上忙。但另一個星球也可以幫忙嗎?有一些星球太熱，有一些星球太冷。有一些星球還可以的，但它們有水嗎？

content.en: The planet Mars is not too hot or too cold. Scientists are learning more about its environment. They sent robots to look around.
content.tw: 火星不會太熱或太冷。科學家派機器人去了解。

content.en: Guess what one robot found?! Salt water! Mars had salt water a long time ago. Maybe Mars has water now!
content.tw: 他們找到了甚麼呢？一台機器人找到鹽水。火星很久以前有鹽水，或許現在有淡水了！

content.en: Can people live on Mars one day? Scientists need to find out more. For now, let's help our environment here on Earth!
content.tw: 人類有朝一日能住在火星上嗎？科學家需要進一步了解。目前，讓我們從地球開始幫助我們的環境吧！

vocabulary.preface: 有水的地方可能就有生命，科學家很想知道別的行星是否有水。

content.text:
1. sky 天空
Hey, you're back! 你回來了！
How's Hehuanshan? 合歡山如何啊？
It was great! The air was fresh and the sky seemed bigger.

2. cloud 雲
There were no clouds at night so we watched the stars.
That's wonderful! 太棒了！

3. grass 草地
So you just laid on the ground outside? 所以你們就躺在外面地上？
Yeah, we laid on the grass until midnight. 對，躺在草地上到半夜。

4. long time ago 很久以前
I love stargazing. 我喜歡觀星。
I saw many shooting stars on Taipingshan a long time ago.

vocabulary.postscript: 今天的單字很好記。sky 天空 cloud 雲 grass 草地 long time ago 很久以前

quiz.question: 1. What does the Earth's environment do?
2. What did scientists send to Mars?
3. What did Mars have a long time ago?

title: Dog Walked 250 Kilometers Across Sea Ice

content.en: Ugh… I'm tired of walking. Why did I want to walk home? My legs are very tired.
content.tw: 走路回家好累人，我的腳好酸。

content.en: How many kilometers can you walk? One kilometer? Five kilometers? Ten kilometers?
content.tw: 你們可以連續走幾公里呢？一公里、五公里、還是十公里呢？

content.en: How about more than two hundred fifty kilometers? That's a very long walk. But somebody did it. Oh wait! Not somebody… some dog did it. His name is Nanuq.
content.tw: 如果要走兩百五十公里呢？有一隻狗狗做到了！牠叫做 Nanuq。

content.en: Nanuq went out with some other dogs one day. The other dogs came back. But he didn't come back. His family could not find him. They were very worried. Was Nanuq okay?
content.tw: Nanuq 有一天跟一群狗狗出去玩，但是其他的狗狗都回來了，Nanuq 卻沒有回來。牠的主人找不到牠，非常擔心。

content.en: Nanuq was gone for more than a month! Then his family found him. Nanuq was in a place across the sea! The place was two hundred fifty kilometers away! How did Nanuq walk across that many kilometers of seawater?
content.tw: 牠失蹤了四十多天，結果在海的另一邊被找到了。牠走了兩百五十公里！牠是怎麼越過大海的呢？

content.en: Nanuq and his family live in a very, very cold place. The sea is icy. Nanuq's family thinks he walked on sea ice. Nanuq was very lucky. He was okay! And he was home!
content.tw: Nanuq 跟牠的主人住在很冷的地方，海面都結冰了。Nanuq 的家人認為牠是走在冰上面過去的。Nanuq 非常地幸運，牠現在終於回家了！

content.en: No one knows how Nanuq crossed two hundred fifty kilometers of seawater! What do you think?
content.tw: 沒有人知道 Nanuq 是如何跨越兩百五十公里的海水！你覺得呢？

vocabulary.preface: 一隻牧羊犬是如何越過白令海峽? 牠的主人很好奇。

content.text:
1. tired of 厭倦
I'm looking forward to winter. 我很期待冬天。
I'm tired of summer. 我厭倦夏天了。
Too bad. 糟糕了。
Summer is just beginning. 夏天才剛開始呢。

2. gone 離開，消失
I wish it was already gone. 我希望它已經走了。
Why do you hate summer so much? 你為什麼那麼討厭夏天?
It's too hot. I miss the cold days. 太熱了。我想念冷天氣。

3. cold 冷的
Winter in Taipei is too cold for me. 台北的冬天對我來說太冷了。
In Canada, it's icy everywhere in winter. 加拿大的冬天，到處都結冰。

4. worried 擔心的
People would be worried about too much snow. 大家會擔心雪太多了。

vocabulary.postscript:
Are you tired of summer?
tired of 厭倦
gone 離開，消失
cold 冷的
worried 擔心的

quiz.question: 1. Where does this story take place?
2. What is Nanuq?
3. What does Nanuq's family think he walked across?

content.en: Some people like to exercise on their own. Maybe they like jogging, or going to the gym. Some people like to play team sports, like baseball or basketball. They play with their friends on a team.
There's a fun new team sport! It's reading!
content.tw: 有一些人喜歡自己去運動，像是慢跑或去健身房。有一些人喜歡團隊運動，像是棒球或籃球。但現在有一種新的團隊運動，就是閱讀！

content.en: At some schools, students can make teams. The teams read 10 books to get ready for a game. They talk about the books. Who are the writers? What are the names of the books? What are the books about? Who are the people in the books? Students study the books. Then the teams are ready.
content.tw: 學生可以組隊，一起閱讀十本書。然後討論作者、書名、書的內容、角色等等。

content.en: The teams play against other teams at their school. The winners play against teams from other schools.
One team played against another school's team. Their families, friends, and other students were watching. The teams answered 20 questions. But there was no winner yet!
content.tw: 校內比賽的贏家會跟其他的學校比賽，家人朋友都來看比賽！但是回答了 20 題，贏家還沒有出爐。

content.en: The teams answered eight more questions. They gave good answers again and again! Which team was going to win the game?
content.tw: 比賽隊伍又回答了 8 題，通通答對了，到底最後會獎落誰家？

content.en: Then... there was a winner!
Reading on a team and playing against other teams is fun! Could reading be a sport in Taiwan?
content.tw: 團隊閱讀並與其他隊伍比賽很有趣！閱讀在台灣也能成為一項運動嗎？

vocabulary.preface: 閱讀這種靜態活動，也可以當成團隊運動項目來比賽呢。

content.text:
1. gym 健身房
Heading out for the gym? 去健身房嗎？
Right, I really need to work out. 對，我真的需要運動。
I've been lazy for two weeks. 我已經偷懶兩個星期。

2. jog 慢跑
Gym is boring. 健身房很無聊。
You can try some outdoor sports. 你可以試試看戶外運動。
Like jogging or biking? 像是跑步或是騎車嗎？
No, thank you. 不，謝了。

3. exercise 運動
I'd rather exercise indoors. 我寧願在室內運動。
It's no fun when you're alone.自己一個人不好玩。

4. talk about 說到
You can talk about things when you jog with someone. 你跟別人一起跑可以聊天。
No, I don't want to wait for others. 不，我不想等別人。

vocabulary.postscript:
Let's read the vocabulary.
gym 健身房
jog 慢跑
exercise 運動
talk about 說到

quiz.question: 1. Which of these is not a team sport?
2. How do students get ready to read as a sport?
3. How many books did the teams have to read?

content.en: Hello from sunny Greece! I'm here on vacation. Today is World Oceans Day, so I'm relaxing at the beach!
content.tw: 今天是世界海洋日，而我正在希臘的海邊逍遙！

content.en: The beaches in this country are great. The sand is soft and the sea is beautiful! For me, swimming at the beach is easy. I can just stand up and walk into the sea!
content.tw: 只要站起來，走進海裡，就可以游泳。

content.en: But how about people who can't move easily? Sand makes walking hard for them. And some people can't walk. They use wheelchairs. But wheels don't work well on sand…
content.tw: 但是對於有行動障礙的人，沙子很不好走，輪椅在沙灘上也難行動。

content.en: Greece has the answer: special ramps to the sea! Greece is putting these ramps on 287 beaches! The ramps are free and easy to use. People press a button. The ramp carries them into the water. Then they can swim!
content.tw: 希臘想出了辦法! 他們在 287 座海灘搭建了坡道，只要坐上坡道的椅子，按一下按鈕，椅子往下到海邊，就可以游泳了！

content.en: What happens when they get tired? No problem! The ramp carries them from the sea to the beach! Now people who can't move easily can go in and out of the water!
content.tw: 玩累了怎麼辦呢？很簡單，爬上坡道的椅子，電動椅會把他們送回岸上。這樣行動不便的人也可以盡情玩水了！

content.en: These special ramps make swimming in the sea easy for everyone. Great job, Greece!
content.tw: 這些特殊的坡道讓每個人都能輕鬆地在海中游泳。希臘做得好！

vocabulary.preface: 希臘的海灘坡道，讓身體有障礙的人也能享受海泳的樂趣。

content.text:
1. sand 沙子
It feels so good to walk on sand barefoot. 打光腳走在沙灘上真舒服。
Such cool and soft sand! 這麼涼快柔軟的沙子！

2. relax 放鬆
We should come here every weekend. 我們應該每個周末都來。
It'll make me more relaxed. 會讓我放鬆得多。

3. hard 困難的
You don't have a hard life, Nancy. 你的生活並不難啊。
Oh, but I do. 很難的。
I have to get up every day. 我得每天起床。
And feed three cats and one dog. 餵三隻貓和一隻狗。

4. vacation 假期
Don't tell me you need a vacation. 別跟我說你需要度假。
That's what I was about to say! 我正要說呢！

vocabulary.postscript: 今天的單字你記住了幾個？sand 沙子 relax 放鬆 hard 困難的 vacation 假期

quiz.question: 1. What special day is today?
2. How many beaches in Greece will have these ramps?
3. What does it cost to use the special ramp?

content.en: I love the beach! Let's swim! Wait! What's all that brown stuff? It smells like bad eggs!
content.tw: 我喜歡海邊，我們去游泳吧！等一下，海灘上那個咖啡色的東西是甚麼？它聞起來好像臭掉的雞蛋。

content.en: That brown stuff is seaweed. Seaweed grows in the ocean. Ocean waves push it to the beach.
content.tw: 原來是海帶。海帶生長在海裡，被海浪推到沙灘上。

content.en: Some beaches have a lot of smelly seaweed! People don't want to go to those beaches.
content.tw: 有的海灘會有很多臭臭的海帶，讓人根本不想去。

content.en: What can we do with this seaweed? Well, we can make houses!
content.tw: 這些海帶可以拿來做什麼呢？可以用來蓋房子！

content.en: A gardener in Mexico is making houses from seaweed. His company cleans the seaweed from the beach. He mixes the seaweed with other materials.He makes the blocks. He dries them under Mexico's hot sun. Then the gardener builds houses with the blocks. He makes a little money by selling some of the houses. He gave 14 houses to people in need.
content.tw: 墨西哥的一個園丁用海帶來建造房屋。他的公司清理海灘上的海帶，然後把海帶混合其他的材料，製造成磚塊，用這些磚塊來蓋房子，賣掉這些房子可以賺一點錢。他也曾經把十四棟房子送給需要的人。

content.en: Are the seaweed blocks safe? Researchers say they are good for 120 years.
content.tw: 這些海帶磚安全嗎？研究人員說它們還可以維持一百二十年。

content.en: Lots of seaweed on beaches is a problem. Making houses from this seaweed is a great idea!
content.tw: 海灘上有很多海帶是個問題。用這些海帶蓋房子是個好主意！

vocabulary.preface: 海帶可以用來當作房屋的建材，沒有想到吧？

content.text:
1. make 做
Let's have some sushi tonight. 我們今晚來吃壽司。
I'll make them myself. 我自己來做。
Good. Then I'll make seaweed pork rib soup. 好啊，那我做個海帶排骨湯。

2. smelly 有臭味
Why is sushi so delicious? 為什麼壽司這麼好吃？
Because I'm a good cook? 因為我是很棒的廚師？
Of course. But I sometimes find sushi a little smelly.
當然啦，不過我有時候覺得它有點臭。

3. egg 蛋
But it's just rice and some fish. 但它只是米飯加一點魚。
And some eggs. 還有一些蛋。

4. mix with 混合
You like eggs, right? 你喜歡蛋，對吧？
Yeah, especially when they're mixed with onions. 對，特別是它混搭洋蔥的時候。

vocabulary.postscript:
請注意，來一起讀單字。
make 做
smelly 有臭味
egg 蛋
mix with 混和

quiz.question: 1. Where does the gardener live?
2. What's bad about seaweed on the beach?
3. How many years are the seaweed blocks good?

title: Boy Gets Stuck in Claw Machine

content.en: I'm at an arcade!
content.tw: 我人在遊樂場！

content.en: They have lots of driving games! But they make me carsick.
content.tw: 我人在遊樂場，這裡有好多賽車遊戲，但我會暈車。

content.en: Look! Over there! They have fighting games! Ugh… they're too scary for me!
content.tw: 還有槍戰遊戲，但我覺得有一點恐怖。

content.en: I know! I'm going over there to the claw machines!
content.tw: 我知道了！我要去那邊玩夾娃娃機！

content.en: Do you know what a claw machine is? Taiwan has lots!
content.tw: 你知道什麼是夾娃娃機嗎？台灣有很多！

content.en: A claw machine looks like a big glass box. There's always a prize in it! The prize can be a toy, candy, or sometimes something expensive! Players can win a cell phone from some claw machines!
content.tw: 我要去玩夾娃娃機。它像個大玻璃櫃，獎品有玩具、糖果，還可能有很貴的東西，像是手機！

content.en: To win a prize, a player picks it up with a claw. The claw is a metal robot hand. Picking up the prize sounds easy doesn't it? But it's very hard!
content.tw: 你需要控制金屬爪子去夾獎品，聽起來很簡單，其實很不容易。

content.en: A boy played a claw machine. But he didn't win. What did he do then? He climbed inside it. He wanted to take the prize!
content.tw: 一個男孩玩夾娃娃機，但他沒有贏。然後他做了什麼？他爬進去。他想拿獎品！

content.en: But then the boy got stuck in the claw machine!
content.tw: 有一個男孩夾不到獎品，就爬進娃娃機裡面，結果卡在裡面出不來！

content.en: Some people got him out safely. But now he cannot play that claw machine for one whole year!
content.tw: 後來大家把他安全救出來，但是他一整年不能再玩夾娃娃機了。

content.en: Hmm… I want a prize too. But I won't climb inside! I'll play the right way… wish me luck!
content.tw: 嗯...我也想要獎品。但我不會爬進去！我會用正確的方式玩…祝我好運！

vocabulary.preface: 夾不到獎品的小男孩，乾脆爬進夾娃娃機的玻璃櫃裡。

content.text:
1. prize 獎品
Wait, I want to play this one. 等一下，我要玩這個。
You're such a child, Paz. 你真是個小孩。
Look at all these prizes. 你看這些獎品。
They are so much fun! 都很好玩呢。

2. toy 玩具
They are just cheap toys. 它們都只是些便宜玩具。
You're not still playing with toys, are you? 你沒有在玩玩具了吧？

3. pick up 撿起來
I am. And I like cheap toys. 我有，我喜歡便宜玩具。
Now I have to pick up this car. 現在我一定要夾這個汽車。

4. over there 在那裏
Oh no! Why is it so hard? 糟糕，怎麼這麼難？
Come on. Let me buy you ice cream at the store over there.
來吧，我請你到那邊店裡吃冰淇淋。

vocabulary.postscript:
你喜歡玩夾娃娃機嗎？
prize 獎品
toy 玩具
pick up 撿起來
over there 在那裏

quiz.question: 1. What does a claw machine look like?
2. What is always inside a claw machine?
3. When can the boy play the claw machine again?

content.en: Hi there! Today's news is about a vending machine. Vending means selling. So a vending machine is a 'selling machine'.
content.tw: "Vending" 的意思就是賣。今天的新聞跟自動販賣機有關。

content.en: You put money in the vending machine. You push the number of the thing you want to buy. Then it drops down. You can buy candy, chips, or drinks from vending machines. You can buy other things too.
content.tw: 你只要投錢，按按鈕選你要的商品，它就會掉下來。你可以在販賣機買到糖果、洋芋片、飲料，還有很多其他的東西。

content.en: There is a special vending machine in Tainan. It doesn't sell candy, chips, or drinks. It just sells one thing: eggs! People love to see this egg vending machine. They love to take pictures of it.
content.tw: 台南有一台特別的販賣機，只賣一種東西，那就是雞蛋！這台販賣機吸引了很多人來參觀跟拍照。

content.en: How much are the eggs? One egg is 25 NT. That's a lot of money!
content.tw: 裡面一顆雞蛋要賣 25 塊錢，好貴！

content.en: Do eggs break in the vending machine? No, they don't break. That's good. No one wants to buy a broken egg. But some eggs get stuck. They don't come out of the vending machine. That's because the eggs are different sizes. But this can be fixed.
content.tw: 販賣機裡面的雞蛋不會破掉，但因為雞蛋的大小不同，有可能會卡在機器裡面，不過這個問題很好處理。

content.en: Do you want to buy eggs from a vending machine? I think I'll save my money and go to a supermarket!
content.tw: 你想從自動販賣機買雞蛋嗎？我想我會省下錢去超市！

vocabulary.preface: 自動販賣機的商品五花八門，甚至還有雞蛋。

content.text: 1. candy 糖果. A vending machine? Wow, I'm saved! There are only candy bars and chips here.
2. how much 多少. Are you sure you want to eat this? Let me see how much they cost first.
3. machine 機器. Hmmmm, everything costs 30 NT in the machine. That's more money than at the supermarket.
4. buy 買. So do you still want to buy them? Yeah, I'm too hungry to wait.

vocabulary.postscript:
今天的單字你記住了幾個？
candy 糖果
how much 多少
machine 機器
buy 買

quiz.question: 1. What is a vending machine?
2. How many dollars is one egg?
3. Why do some eggs get stuck?

title: Student Fails to Hide Bad Grades

content.en: The mail's here! A lot of important mail comes to your house. Like birthday cards, or report cards from your school. Report cards show how you're doing at school. They show all of your grades. ALL of them! The good ones and the bad.
content.tw: 信箱裡有各種郵件，包括成績單。它上面有你所有好的壞的成績，寄到你家信箱。

content.en: A high school student in Taiwan was getting good grades at school. Until her boyfriend broke her heart. Then her grades got very, very bad…
content.tw: 台灣有一個高中生原本成績很好，但在一次失戀後，她的成績跌到谷谷。

content.en: Her mother was waiting at home for the report card. She was going to be very angry! The student wanted to hide her report card from her mother. She didn't want anyone to know. So she hired… a detective!
content.tw: 她媽媽在家裡等成績單，但是高中生想要把成績單藏起來，所以雇用了一個偵探！

content.en: Detectives can do things in secret, without anyone knowing. But they cost a lot of money! The student paid the detective. The detective hid the report card.
content.tw: 學生給了偵探很多錢，請他幫忙把成績單藏起來，他也照辦了。

content.en: But then, the story got in the news! Her mother saw her bad grades in the paper!
content.tw: 結果這件事情上了新聞，她的媽媽也在新聞上看到了她的成績！

content.en: The student lost lots of money. And she failed to hide her bad grades! Don't do what she did! It's better to tell the truth and study hard.
content.tw: 這名學生損失了很多錢。她也沒能成功隱藏她的爛成績！不要做她做過的事！最好是說實話並努力學習。

vocabulary.preface: 這名高中生不想讓爸媽看成績單，於是用了很特別的辦法。

content.text: 1. hide 隱藏 Have you ever tried to hide your report card? 你有試過把成績單藏起來嗎？ That would be useless. 沒有用。 Why? 為什麼？ Because we have to get our parents to sign it. 因為我們得讓爸媽簽名。
2. grade 分數 And return it to your teacher? 然後要還給你的老師？ Right. 對。 Even when you get bad grades? 就算成績很爛也要？ Especially when we get bad grades. 尤其是成績很爛時更要。
3. angry 生氣的 So your mom would get angry with you? 所以你媽媽會對你生氣？ No, not really. 不會。 But she would be worried. 但是她會擔心。
4. hire 雇用 She would also hire a tutor for me. 她也會幫我雇一個家教。

vocabulary.postscript: 你會擔心成績單不好看嗎? 來讀單字。 hide 隱藏 grade 分數 angry 生氣的 hire 雇用

quiz.question: 1. Who sends report cards in the mail?
2. What kind of grades are shown on a report card?
3. How much do detectives cost?

title: Man Lives on Soda for 17 Years

content.en: That tastes sooooo good! But one glass is all I want. A 58-year-old man from Iran likes soda a lot. He drinks three large bottles of soda every day!
content.tw: 我喜歡汽水，不過喝一小杯就夠了。但是在伊朗，有一個 58 歲的男子很愛喝汽水。他每天喝三大罐汽水！

content.en: How much does the man like soda? He likes it so much, he doesn't eat food! He only drinks soda. He says that's all he needs.
content.tw: 他有多愛喝汽水呢？他喜歡到只喝汽水不吃飯！

content.en: The man stopped eating food in 2006.
content.tw: 這個男子從 2006 年之後就沒有吃過飯了。

content.en: He woke up one night with a very strange feeling in his mouth. He went to many doctors. Why did he have that strange feeling? The doctors did not know.
content.tw: 他某一天半夜起床，覺得嘴巴裡面有一種怪怪的感覺，看了好多醫生都沒有用。

content.en: Going to the doctors did not help the man. And looking at food made him feel sick. So he stopped eating. That was 17 years ago!
content.tw: 他去看醫生也沒有什麼幫助，他只要看到食物就全身不舒服，於是停止吃飯，那是 17 年前的事了。

content.en: The man says soda gives him energy. He does not feel hungry. His family does not eat in front of him now. They know looking at food makes him feel sick.
content.tw: 這個男子說，汽水讓他有精神，不覺得餓，他的家人現在也不在他面前吃飯了，他們知道看著食物會讓他感到噁心。

content.en: It's not a good idea to stop eating food! Most doctors say we should eat three meals a day. That's breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
content.tw: 但是不吃飯對身體不好，醫生建議一天應該要吃三餐。

content.en: Just soda? And no food? For 17 years?! No, thanks… Uh-oh, now I'm hungry!
content.tw: 只有汽水？沒有食物？長達17年？！不，謝謝… 噢，現在我餓了！

vocabulary.preface: 有人沒辦法吃東西，只能喝汽水維生。

content.text: 1. drink 喝 Why do we have to eat and drink every day? 我們為什麼每天都得吃吃喝喝? Because we like to stay alive? 因為我們想要活著?
2. sick 生病的 No. 不對。 So what's your answer? 那你的答案是什麼? We need food because we don't want to be sick.
3. strange 奇怪的 That's a strange thing to say. 這是很奇怪的說法。 I mean it. 真的啊。
4. doctor 醫生 I tried to stop eating for 2 days. 我試著兩天不吃飯。 I had to see a doctor. 就得去看醫生。 Then why did you do it? 那你為什麼不吃? I just wanted to see how it felt. 我只是想看看是什麼感覺。

vocabulary.postscript: 你每天吃三餐嗎? 來一起讀單字。 drink 喝 sick 生病的 strange 奇怪的 doctor 醫生

quiz.question: 1. Where is the 58-year-old man from?
2. When did the man stop eating food?
3. How many meals should we eat every day?

content.en: Guys! There's a butterfly on my nose! *giggle* It tickles! *sneeze* Aa… aa… AAA-CHOO!
How many kinds of butterflies are there? Scientists say there are more than 19,000 kinds! Butterflies have lots of beautiful colors.
content.tw: 科學家說，世界上的蝴蝶種類超過一萬九千種！蝴蝶有各種繽紛的色彩。

content.en: Where did the first butterfly come from? Scientists wanted to know. They went back 100 million years. That's back to dinosaur times…
content.tw: 科學家想知道，世界上第一隻蝴蝶出現在甚麼時候？他們一路找回到一億年前，也就是恐龍的時代。

content.en: Many kinds of animals were not living yet. There were no dogs. There were no cats. And there were no butterflies. But there were lots and lots of moths.

Moths and butterflies are in the same family. But they are very different. Butterflies have lots of bright colors: yellow, blue, green, and more. Most moths do not. That's because moths fly at night. Many are black, brown, or gray. These dark colors help them keep safe.
content.tw: 蛾跟蝴蝶是親戚，但牠們其實大不相同。蝴蝶有很多鮮豔顏色，蛾沒有，這是因為蛾是夜行性的，暗沉的顏色比較安全。

content.en: Scientists think a moth didn't like the dark 100 million years ago. It liked the light! It wanted to fly in the bright sunlight! Flying in the sun made the moth's dark colors brighter. Now scientists think that's where the first butterfly came from!
content.tw: 科學家認為一億年前，有一隻蛾不喜歡晚上，牠喜歡光亮的地方！在陽光下飛讓這隻蛾的顏色變亮了，科學家認為這就是第一隻蝴蝶的起源！

content.en: A dark moth gave the world beautiful bright butterflies, thanks to the sun!
content.tw: 一隻深色的蛾為世界帶來了美麗鮮豔的蝴蝶，這都歸功於太陽！

vocabulary.preface: 一億年前的陽光，讓蛾類開始演化成蝴蝶。

content.text:
1. bright 光亮的
Wow, look at these paintings! 哇，你看這些畫。
The colors are so bright and beautiful! 顏色好鮮明，真好看！

2. sunlight 陽光
Yeah, it's like they come alive under the sunlight.
對啊，在陽光下好像變成活的。
How many butterflies are there in this painting? 這幅畫裡有幾隻蝴蝶？

3. dark 黑暗的
I guess at least one hundred. 我猜至少一百隻。
It would look good on a dark wall. 掛在黑暗的牆上可能不錯。

4. night 夜晚
The dark wall of our house? 我們家那面黑暗牆壁嗎？
Are you thinking of buying it? 你想買這幅畫？
Maybe. It would look even better at night. 也許。它晚上看起來可能更好。

vocabulary.postscript:
來讀讀單字。
bright 光亮的
sunlight 陽光
dark 黑暗的
night 夜晚

quiz.question: 1. How many kinds of butterflies are there?
2. Which animals have lots of beautiful, bright colors?
3. Why do most moths have dark colors?

title: Iraqis Plant Trees to Stop Deserts

content.en: Phew! It's very dry! Are we in a desert? I need water...
A desert is a place without water. It gets very little rain. It's hard to find plants in a desert. Plants need water to grow.
content.tw: 沙漠裡面很少下雨，水很少，也沒有甚麼植物。

content.en: Good soil needs plants. Without plant roots, the soil can't hold water. The soil gets hard and dry. No plants can grow. The place becomes a desert.
content.tw: 少了植物的根，土壤很難留住水分，很快就會變乾、變硬。最後這片土地就會變成沙漠。

content.en: Iraq has two big deserts. This country has long, hot, and dry summers. Now the earth is getting hotter. And Iraq is getting less water from rain and rivers. More places there are becoming desert.
content.tw: 伊拉克有兩個大沙漠。伊拉克的夏天又長又熱，現在因為全球暖化，伊拉克的水越來越少，更多地方變成了沙漠。

content.en: People want good soil again. So some people planted trees. Then more people planted trees! Now Iraq wants to plant 5 million trees!
content.tw: 伊拉克希望改善土壤品質，決定開始種樹。他們決心要種五百萬顆樹！

content.en: The tree roots will help the soil hold water. Then more plants can grow. Their roots will help the soil. Then more plants can grow. Their roots will help the soil. Then more…
content.tw: 樹根可以幫助土壤留住水分，這樣就可以種更多植物，留住更多水分，變成一個正向循環！

content.en: The earth needs our help! Can you plant a tree today?
content.tw: 地球需要我們的幫助！你今天能種一棵樹嗎？

vocabulary.preface: 伊拉克希望多種樹，把沙漠變成綠洲。

content.text:
1. grow 種植.
I'm trying to grow roses, but it's a lot of work.我正在種玫瑰，但是它需要做好多事.
Roses? You can't even grow cucumbers! 玫瑰? 你甚至不會種小黃瓜!

2. soil 泥土.
That's why I'm using the soil for roses. 這是為什麼我用這些泥土來種玫瑰.

3. root 根部.
But roses have deep roots. 但是玫瑰的根很深.
Your pots are not big enough. 你的花盆不夠大.
Since when did you know so much about roses? 你什麼時候開始這麼懂我玫瑰?

4. more 更多.
I read about it. 我有看書.
But I learned more from my mom. 但是我從我媽媽那裏學到更多.
She plants roses every year. 她每年都種玫瑰.

vocabulary.postscript:
你有種過任何植物嗎? 一起來讀今天的單字。
grow種植
soil泥土
root根部
more更多

quiz.question: 1. What is a desert?
2. What can grow when tree roots help the soil hold water?
3. How many trees do they plan to plant in Iraq?

title: Pair Makes Tropical Fruit Farm With One Tree

content.en: Mmm… I love wax apples. It's my favorite fruit. I want wax apple trees in my garden. Then I can pick wax apples when I want them. I can eat them all the time!
content.tw: 我好愛吃蓮霧！好希望能夠在我的花園種一顆蓮霧樹，讓我想吃就可以摘。

content.en: Farmers in Taiwan grow a lot of wax apples. We can get them at fruit stands and supermarkets here. But sometimes we can't get wax apples in other countries.
content.tw: 在台灣買到蓮霧很容易，不過在其他國家就不一定了。

content.en: A husband and wife from Taiwan live in the USA. He wanted to eat wax apples there. But he didn't find any. Then someone gave him a wax apple tree. The pair made a tropical fruit farm... with that one tree!
content.tw: 有一對住在美國的台灣夫妻，老公想要吃蓮霧，但是在美國找不到。後來有人給了他們一棵蓮霧樹，這對夫妻就用一棵樹，種出了一整座熱帶水果園！

content.en: "Uncle Happy Farmer" and his wife made the farm 40 years ago. Now their farm has more than 40 kinds of tropical fruits and vegetables. His wife grows the fruit trees. Uncle Happy Farmer grows the vegetables.
content.tw: 「快樂農夫叔叔」跟他的老婆四十年前建了這座農場，現在農場裡面已經有四十多種蔬果。老婆種水果，老公種蔬菜。

content.en: A chicken helps them! Her name is Lucy. Her poop is good for the trees.
content.tw: 還有一隻雞 Lucy 會幫忙！牠的便便對樹木很好。

content.en: Maybe I can make a fruit farm too. And maybe I can get a chicken to help me! Then I'll have all the wax apples I can eat!
content.tw: 也許我也能建一個水果農場。也許我能找隻雞來幫忙！這樣我就能想吃多少蓮霧就吃多少了！

vocabulary.preface: 快樂農夫叔叔農場有各種蔬菜水果。

content.text:
1. fruit stand 水果攤。
Don't you just love fruit stands? 你會不會很喜歡水果攤?
They are so pretty to look at. 它們真好看。

2. farm 農場。
You're right. 你說得對。
Red apples, yellow bananas and green guavas. 紅蘋果，黃香蕉，綠芭樂。
My cousin owns a fruit farm in Taitung. 我表哥在台東有一個農場。

3. pick 採摘。
We sometimes go there to pick the fruit. 我們有時候會去那裏採果子。
How nice! 真好!
Yeah, it's wonderful! 對啊，是很棒。

4. chicken 雞。
He raises chickens, too. 他也養雞。
So you would have chicken soup after the hard work. 所以你們辛苦工作之後就喝雞湯。
No! He never wanted to kill the chickens. 沒有，他從來不肯殺雞。

vocabulary.postscript:
你最喜歡什麼水果呢?
fruit stand水果攤
farm農場
pick採摘
chicken雞

quiz.question: 1. What is the husband known as?
2. Where do the husband and wife live?
3. What did the pair start their fruit farm with?

content.en: Australia has some very cool animals. It has the world's smallest penguins! They're called little penguins. They're 35 centimeters tall!
content.tw: 澳洲有世界上最小的企鵝，叫做小企鵝，牠只有 35 公分高！

content.en: Foxes were eating the little penguins. So they moved to small islands near Australia. The water around the islands kept the foxes away.
content.tw: 狐狸會獵捕小企鵝，後來小企鵝遷移到澳洲附近的小島，狐狸過不來。

content.en: One island had 600 little penguins. But foxes found a way to the island! The foxes ate and ate the little penguins. Then there were only 10 little penguins left.
content.tw: 原本島上有 600 隻小企鵝，結果狐狸找到方法登陸，吃掉了好多小企鵝，後來島上只剩下 10 隻小企鵝了。

content.en: Local people worried about saving these little penguins. Then a local farmer had an idea…
content.tw: 當地居民擔心如何拯救這些小企鵝。後來一位當地農夫想出了一個主意...

content.en: His farm has thousands of chickens. The farmer's dogs keep his chickens safe from foxes. The dogs are big. They have a very deep bark. They bark to keep the foxes away. But the dogs are kind to the chickens. So the farmer wanted his dogs to keep the little penguins safe too!
content.tw: 當地居民想要拯救小企鵝。有一個農夫養了好幾千隻雞，也養了狗來保護牠們。要是狐狸靠近，狗會狂吠，把狐狸嚇走。這位農夫希望狗狗也可以保護小企鵝的安全！

content.en: The farmer's idea worked! The dogs kept the foxes away. The dogs are kind to the penguins too. And there are more little penguins every year.
content.tw: 結果成功了！狗狗嚇走了狐狸，現在島上的小企鵝越來越多了。

content.en: Now the island has hundreds of little penguins. Thanks to the farmer's great idea, big dogs are saving little penguins!
content.tw: 現在島上有數百隻小企鵝。多虧了農夫的好主意，大狗正在拯救小企鵝！

vocabulary.preface: 友善的狗既保護養雞場，也保護小企鵝。

content.text:
1. keep away 離遠一點
Is that your dog? 那是你的狗嗎？
Keep it away from me! 讓牠離我遠點！
Sorry, but Buddy doesn't bite. Don't worry. 抱歉，不過巴弟不會咬人，別擔心。

2. safe 安全的
No, I don't feel safe when it barks like that. 牠那樣叫我覺得不安全。
There, you're safe now. 好了，你現在安全了。

3. big 大的
Why do you keep such a big dog? 你為什麼養那麼大的狗？
Buddy is not that big。巴弟沒有那麼大。
And he's cool.而且牠很酷。

4. island 島嶼
He can swim fast. 牠可以游泳游很快。
We sometimes swim to that island together. 我們有時候一起游到那個小島。
Wow, that's far away! 哇，很遠呢！

vocabulary.postscript:
我們來讀單字。
keep away 離遠一點
safe 安全的
big 大的
island 島嶼

quiz.question: 1. Which planet has the most moons?
2. What do the dogs do to keep the penguins safe?
3. What does the farm have?

title: Music Festival Pays for Classes for Kids

content.en: Summer's here! That means… it's music festival time! Music festivals are big events. Lots of musicians sing and play music.
content.tw: 夏天是音樂節的時候！很多歌手會在音樂節唱歌表演。

content.en: Are you a music fan? You can have lots of fun at a music festival! There are pop festivals, hip-hop festivals, jazz festivals, rock festivals, classical music festivals, folk festivals, blues festivals, reggae festivals...
content.tw: 音樂節有好多種，流行音樂、嘻哈、爵士樂、搖滾、古典音樂、民謠、藍調、雷鬼音樂節等等...

content.en: There's a very special music festival this summer. It's called Ossyfest. Ossyfest is in Oswaldtwistle, a town in the UK. This year's festival will have forty musicians. The musicians play for free. But people pay to go to Ossyfest…
content.tw: 英國一個小鎮 Oswaldtwistle 舉辦了特別的音樂節，叫做 Ossyfest。今年有 40 個音樂家會表演。他們免費表演，但是觀眾要付費。

content.en: Where does the money from Ossyfest go? All the money pays for music classes for local kids! Last year, Ossyfest paid for music classes for 400 kids! Ossyfest saved their parents thousands of dollars.
content.tw: 這些錢去哪裡呢？都幫當地的孩子付了音樂課的學費，去年有 400 位小朋友免費上音樂課，幫爸爸媽媽省了好多錢！

content.en: Ossyfest and its musicians hope these local kids will make their own songs. Maybe the kids will play at Ossyfest someday!
content.tw: Ossyfest 的音樂家希望這些孩子以後也可以自己創作音樂，說不定還可以回來 Ossyfest 表演！

content.en: Today is Make Music Day. Ossyfest's musicians make music because they hope kids will make music someday. So how about making some music yourself? Maybe you'll play at a music festival someday too!
content.tw: 今天是音樂日。Ossyfest 的音樂家們製作音樂，因為他們希望有一天孩子們也能製作音樂。那麼，你自己也來製作一些音樂怎麼樣？也許有一天你也能在音樂節上表演！

vocabulary.preface: 英國小鎮這個音樂節，門票收入讓兒童學音樂。

content.text: 1. music 音樂 I've never been to a music festival. 我從來沒有去過音樂節。 Really? That's too bad. 真的喔，真可惜。 It's a lot of fun.它很好玩的。
2. musician 音樂家 What's it like? 它是什麼樣子？ A music festival? 音樂節嗎？ Lots of musicians would sing on different stages. 很多音樂家在不同的舞台上唱歌。 You can choose the one you like. 你可以選喜歡的。
3. pay 付錢 How much do I have to pay? 我需要付多少錢？ It depends. 不一定。 From about 500 to thousands of NT. 從五百塊左右到好幾千台幣。
4. someday 有一天 I want to go to a festival someday. 我有一天也要去音樂節。 Yeah, you should. 你是該去。

content.en: Hi, everyone! Today's news is about a 10-year-old girl. Her name is Maya. Maya wants to help the world. She wants less plastic pollution in the world.
content.tw: 今天我們要來講一個十歲的小女孩 Maya 的故事。Maya 希望可以減少地球上的塑膠汙染。

content.en: How is Maya helping the world? She is in a group. The group helps the environment. It wants stores to stop using plastic stickers. The plastic stickers are on fruits and vegetables.
content.tw: Maya 要怎麼幫忙呢？她加入了一個環境保護團體，這個團體希望店家可以停止使用貼在蔬菜和水果上的塑膠貼紙。

content.en: Why do stores use these stickers? The stickers make it easy to find the price of a fruit or vegetable. Then customers can pay the right price. The stickers are small. But stores have lots and lots of fruits and vegetables! So the stickers make a lot of plastic pollution. Maya doesn't want stores to use plastic stickers. But stores don't want to stop using them.
content.tw: 這些貼紙讓客人可以找到蔬果的價格。雖然貼紙很小，但蔬菜水果那麼多！這些貼紙會造成塑膠污染，Maya 希望這些店家可以停止使用，但是店家不願意。

content.en: Can stores use paper stickers? Paper is better for the environment. But plastic is stronger. So stores like plastic stickers. Maya wants everyone to know about these plastic stickers. She wants everyone to know these small stickers make a lot of plastic pollution. Then maybe stores will stop using plastic stickers. Maya is great! She's 10. And she's trying to help the world!
content.tw: 商店可以使用紙質貼紙嗎？紙對環境更好，但塑膠更堅固。所以商店喜歡塑膠貼紙。Maya希望每個人都知道這些塑膠貼紙。她希望每個人都知道這些小貼紙會造成大量的塑膠污染。這樣或許商店就會停止使用塑膠貼紙。Maya太棒了！她才10歲，卻正在努力幫助世界！

vocabulary.preface: 減少塑膠汙染，可以從很小的地方開始。

content.text:
1. customer 顧客
How's your first day of work at 7-11? 你第一天在Seven工作如何？
Well, a customer came up to me. 有一個顧客來找我。

2. help 幫忙
And? 然後呢?
She said she wanted half a sandwich. 她說她要半個三明治。
So what did you say? 所以你怎麼說？
I said I couldn't help her.我說我幫不上忙。

3. girl 女孩
The girl came back later. 這個女孩後來又回來。
This time she asked another worker. 這次她問了另外一個店員。
For half a sandwich? 要買半個三明治？
Yeah. 是的。

4. want 要
He asked her, "Do you want the left or the right half?"
他問，你要左半邊還是右半邊？
She just left. 她就走了。
